tool.name: analysis
tool.command:
tripaille analysis load_fasta "$fasta"
#if $organism: --organism "$organism" #end if #if $organism_id: --organism_id "$organism_id" #end if #if $analysis: --analysis "$analysis" #end if #if $analysis_id: --analysis_id "$analysis_id" #end if #if $sequence_type: --sequence_type "$sequence_type" #end if #if $re_name: --re_name "$re_name" #end if #if $re_uniquename: --re_uniquename "$re_uniquename" #end if #if $db_ext_id: --db_ext_id "$db_ext_id" #end if #if $re_accession: --re_accession "$re_accession" #end if #if $rel_type: --rel_type "$rel_type" #end if #if $rel_subject_re: --rel_subject_re "$rel_subject_re" #end if #if $rel_subject_type: --rel_subject_type "$rel_subject_type" #end if #if $method: --method "$method" #end if #if $match_type: --match_type "$match_type" #end if #if $job_name: --job_name "$job_name" #end if #if $no_wait: $no_wait #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: fasta
param.label: Fasta
param.help: Path to the Fasta file to load

param.name: re_uniquename
param.label: Re Uniquename
param.help: Regular expression for the unique name

param.name: re_accession
param.label: Re Accession
param.help: Regular expression for the accession from external DB

param.name: rel_subject_re
param.label: Rel Subject Re
param.help: Relation subject regular expression (used to extract id of related entity)

param.name: rel_subject_type
param.label: Rel Subject Type
param.help: Relation subject type (must match already loaded data, e.g. mRNA)

param.name: method
param.label: Method
param.help: Insertion method (insert, update or insup, default=insup (Insert and Update))

param.name: match_type
param.label: Match Type
param.help: Match type for already loaded features (name or uniquename; default=uniquename; used for \

param.name: no_wait
param.label: No Wait
param.help: Do not wait for job to complete
